episodes.content: Bento connects the world! Discover a universe of bento from Japan and around the world, with step-by-step instructions and delicious tips and tricks!
episodes.description: Mark's bento features sweet and savory steak on rice. Maki uses crabsticks to make a Chinese omelet. Bento Topics takes you to New York City, where teriyaki and bento have become all the rage.
episodes.subtitle: Season 5-14 Steak Gyudon Bento & Kanitama(crab and egg)-don Bento
episodes.title: BENTO EXPO

episodes.content: Bento connects the world! Discover a universe of bento from Japan and around the world, with step-by-step instructions and delicious tips and tricks!
episodes.description: Two chicken bentos! From Maki, Miso Tsukune, and from Marc, Banbanji with sesame dressing. Bento Topics features Kyoto's tasty heritage vegetables and pickles that have inspired a mock-sushi bento.
episodes.subtitle: Season 5-15 Banbanji Bento & Miso Tsukune Bento
episodes.title: BENTO EXPO
